sentences.sContent: She upped and threw the teapot at him.
sentences.sContent_eng: She upped and threw the teapot at him.
sentences.sCn: 她跳起来，将茶壶向他掷去。

sentences.sContent: He once plugged up the spout of a teapot and placed it on the fire.
sentences.sContent_eng: He once plugged up the spout of a teapot and placed it on the fire.
sentences.sCn: 曾有一次，他把茶壶嘴用东西堵住，然后把茶壶放在火炉上。

sentences.sContent: Sounds interesting.I just want to buy a teapot.
sentences.sContent_eng: Sounds interesting.I just want to buy a teapot.
sentences.sCn: 听起来蛮有趣的。我刚好想买个茶壶。

trans.tranOther: a container for making and serving tea, which has a handle and a  spout 1 1
